A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie had everything a long time Star Wars fan could want in a Star Wars movie. Obviously there were some plot holes\, and some of the ways they used the force were a bit of a leap\, but let's be real here. If you can go along with Obi-won and Yoda coming back as force projections\, than everything that happened in this movie is in the realm of possibility. I will be seeing this again.
